CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "cards"
(
    id                      INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    artist                  TEXT,
    asciiName               TEXT,
    availability            TEXT,
    borderColor             TEXT,
    cardKingdomFoilId       TEXT,
    cardKingdomId           TEXT,
    colorIdentity           TEXT,
    colorIndicator          TEXT,

    duelDeck                TEXT,
    edhrecRank              INTEGER,
    faceConvertedManaCost   REAL,
    faceName                TEXT,
    flavorName              TEXT,
    flavorText              TEXT,
    frameEffects            TEXT,
    frameVersion            TEXT,
    hand                    TEXT,
    hasAlternativeDeckLimit INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasContentWarning       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasFoil                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasNonFoil              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isAlternative           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isFullArt               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly            INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOversized             INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPromo                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReprint               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReserved              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStarter               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStorySpotlight        INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTextless              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTimeshifted           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    keywords                TEXT,
    layout                  TEXT,
    leadershipSkills        TEXT,
    life                    TEXT,
    loyalty                 TEXT,
    manaCost                TEXT,
    mcmId                   TEXT,
    mcmMetaId               TEXT,
    mtgArenaId              TEXT,
    mtgjsonV4Id             TEXT,
    mtgoFoilId              TEXT,
    mtgoId                  TEXT,
    multiverseId            TEXT,
    name                    TEXT,
    number                  TEXT,
    originalReleaseDate     TEXT,
    originalText            TEXT,
    originalType            TEXT,
    otherFaceIds            TEXT,
    power                   TEXT,
    printings               TEXT,
    promoTypes              TEXT,
    purchaseUrls            TEXT,
    rarity                  TEXT,
    scryfallId              TEXT,
    scryfallIllustrationId  TEXT,
    scryfallOracleId        TEXT,
    setCode                 TEXT,
    side                    TEXT,
    subtypes                TEXT,
    supertypes              TEXT,
    tcgplayerProductId      TEXT,
    text                    TEXT,
    toughness               TEXT,
    type                    TEXT,
    types                   TEXT,
    uuid                    TEXT              not null
        unique,
    variations              TEXT,
    watermark               TEXT
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "foreign_data"
(
    id           INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    flavorText   TEXT,
    language     TEXT,
    multiverseid INTEGER,
    name         TEXT,
    text         TEXT,
    type         TEXT,
    uuid         TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "foreign_data"
(
    id           INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    flavorText   TEXT,
    language     TEXT,
    multiverseid INTEGER,
    name         TEXT,
    text         TEXT,
    type         TEXT,
    uuid         TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT DISTINCT language FROM foreign_data WHERE language LIKE '%Chinese%'"

sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "
SELECT 
  COUNT(CASE WHEN c.isOnlineOnly = 1 THEN 1 END) as online_only_chinese_simplified,
  COUNT(*) as total_cards,
  CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN c.isOnlineOnly = 1 THEN 1 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(*) * 100 as percentage
FROM cards c
JOIN foreign_data fd ON c.uuid = fd.uuid
WHERE fd.language = 'Chinese Simplified'
"

content.thinking:
Hmm, that's looking at it from the foreign_data perspective. Let me re-read the claim: "Approximately 0.083% of all cards are Chinese Simplified and online-only."

The hint says: "percentage = DIVIDE(COUNT(isOnlineOnly = 1),COUNT(isOnlineOnly))*100"

This suggests the percentage is calculated as: COUNT(cards that are Chinese Simplified AND online-only) / COUNT(all cards) * 100

But wait - the hint says COUNT(isOnlineOnly = 1) / COUNT(isOnlineOnly). That's a bit ambiguous. Let me think about this differently.
 
So I need to find cards that have both Chinese Simplified language data in the foreign_data table AND are marked as online-only. The percentage should be relative to the total card count, not just cards with the isOnlineOnly field populated. Let me reconsider what the hint is actually telling me about the calculation structure.

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "
-- Check: how many cards are online-only AND have Chinese Simplified foreign data
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.uuid) 
FROM cards c
JOIN foreign_data fd ON c.uuid = fd.uuid
WHERE fd.language = 'Chinese Simplified' AND c.isOnlineOnly = 1
"
input.description: Count distinct Chinese Simplified online-only cards

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "
-- Alternative: percentage based on all cards count
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cards c JOIN foreign_data fd ON c.uuid = fd.uuid WHERE fd.language = 'Chinese Simplified' AND c.isOnlineOnly = 1) as numerator,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cards) as denominator,
  CAST((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cards c JOIN foreign_data fd ON c.uuid = fd.uuid WHERE fd.language = 'Chinese Simplified' AND c.isOnlineOnly = 1) AS REAL) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cards) * 100 as pct
"

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "
-- Among Chinese Simplified cards, what % are online-only
SELECT 
  COUNT(CASE WHEN c.isOnlineOnly = 1 THEN 1 END) as online_only,
  COUNT(c.isOnlineOnly) as total,
  CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN c.isOnlineOnly = 1 THEN 1 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(c.isOnlineOnly) * 100 as pct
FROM cards c
JOIN foreign_data fd ON c.uuid = fd.uuid
WHERE fd.language = 'Chinese Simplified'
"

content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "set_translations"
(
    id          INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    language    TEXT,
    setCode     TEXT
        references sets (code)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
    translation TEXT
);
